Description: Fragment of belly of Attic black-figure painted pottery amphora. Hindquarters of horse.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tell Dafana, "Qasr", east annex (C), chamber 27
Curator's comments: Findspot number '27' pencilled on the item (faded)
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 608, 14)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 47)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.209)
